snippet: Alex Poythress, a starting forward for No. 1 Kentucky, will miss the rest of the season after tearing a knee ligament during practice. Poythress, a 6-foot-8 junior, tore the anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee, the university said.
abstract: Kentucky forward Alex Poythress will miss rest of college basketball season with knee injury.
lead_paragraph: Alex Poythress, a starting forward for No. 1 Kentucky, will miss the rest of the season after tearing a knee ligament during practice. Poythress, a 6-foot-8 junior, tore the anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee, the university said.

headline.main: Kentucky Loses Starter Alex Poythress for the Season
headline.print_headline: Kentucky Loses Starter for the Season
